text: teaching them to obey everything that I commanded you;The ‘you’ here refers to the eleven (see verse 16), so they were to pass down all the commands that Jesus had given them. To be a disciple of Jesus you have to do everything that Jesus had commanded the eleven to do—this includes healing and casting out demons, as well as preaching the Gospel. and take note, I am with you every day, until the end of the age!”Since the age has not ended, Jesus is still with us. Praise God!
